value:
[
{
"component": "text",
"value": "Think that we have decided if it rains tomorrow I will not go to play in the park, and if it does not rain then I will go to play in the park. How to write this in code."
},
{
"component": "header",
"variant": 4,
"value": "Consider the following example:"
},
{
"component": "code",
"type": "javascript",
"title": "",
"value": "let condition = 'Raining';
if(condition == 'Raining'){
console.log('I will not go to the park');
}
else{
console.log('I will go to the park')
}"
},
{
"component": "header",
"variant": 3,
"value": "Explanation:"
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "In this example, there are two outputs (play in the park, and not play in the park), which depends on a condition which is the rainfall."
}
]
